pages.title: A Blade of Chaos
pages.text: Fatebreaker is a mystical longsword that shifts unpredictably between buffs and debuffs.

pages.title: Base Form
pages.text: When wielded, Fatebreaker randomly grants either Strength or Weakness upon attacking.

pages.title: Upgraded Form
pages.text: When infused with dark energy, it gains Chaos Strike, which deals random effects to enemies.
